programme.desc: The new medical director breaks the rules to heal the system at America's oldest public hospital. Dr. Max Goodwin sets out to tear up the bureaucracy and provide exceptional care, but the doctors and staff are not so sure he can succeed. They've heard this before. Not taking "no" for an answer, Dr. Goodwin must disrupt the status quo and prove he'll stop at nothing to breathe new life into this underfunded and underappreciated hospital and return it to the glory that put it on the map.(new).
